title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: "Valiant men, they would notbide," says Scott of Satchells, whose own father was one of the number.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: The lands they possessed were chiefly overgrown with heath, and were well described by the couplet in which Scott of Satchells, in his history of the name of Scott, characterizes  the territory of Buccleuch —

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
